data.actual_result: You see the images in search that are supposed to be hidden and are hidden when you jump on them but not in the search.
data.expected_result: You are not supposed to see the image as you are hiding them.
data.short_description: Text & Images options do not work under search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your settings and untick when uploaded directly to discord - Untick When posted as links to chat - Go to a server and upload an image - Go to search and do from:yourusername in:#channel
